channel.title: Death on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Death on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: What It's Like to Work at a Body Farm
item.description: The scavengers are tricky, the smells are gross, and your colleagues are corpses. But some people—mostly women!—love this job.

item.title: What It's Like to Work at a Body Farm
item.description: The scavengers are tricky, the smells are gross, and your colleagues are corpses. But some people—mostly women!—love this job.

item.title: James Lovell, the steady astronaut who brought Apollo 13 home safely, has died
item.description: Lovell was the first person to fly to the Moon twice.
